name: CC TCP/IP Client Socket
desc:
I/O socket that connects a remote tcp port and allows
communication via TCP/IP connection.

Accepts inter-plugin configuration values:
    { "tcp.host": "example.com"} - Override the host configuration
    { "tcp.port": 1234} - Override the port configuration.
    { "network.host": "example.com"} - Alias to "tcp.host".
    { "network.port": 1234} - Alias to "tcp.port".
